alert.note: Alert for Durham; Franklin; Granville; Person; Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:12PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN PERSON...VANCE... NORTHWESTERN WARREN...GRANVILLE...NORTH CENTRAL WAKE...CENTRAL DURHAM AND NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EST... At 411 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Buffalo Springs to Butner. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Durham, Henderson, Oxford, Creedmoor, Butner, Franklinton, Norlina, Kittrell, Youngsville, and Stem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Durham; Franklin; Granville; Person; Vance; Warren
